Description of incident: School district computers                sold to the WH Group at auctions between 1999 and early 2006 contained                the birth dates, SSNs, driver's license numbers and Department of                Juvenile Justice records of approximately 100,000 students. The                computers also held sensitive data for more than 1,000 school district                employees.                UPDATE(12/10/06):                A judge ordered the WH Group to return the computers and the confidential                data on them to the school district.
